SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS IFNULL(SUM(AF.CONF_CNT), 0) AS conf_cnt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.CONF_AMT), 0) AS conf_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.ORG_CARD_RESV_AMT), 0) AS org_card_resv_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.RESV_BASE_AMT), 0) AS resv_base_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.RESV_SVC_AMT), 0) AS resv_svc_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.RESV_CRD_AMT), 0) AS resv_crd_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.BANK_IN_AMT), 0) AS bank_in_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.BANK_IN_BASE_AMT), 0) AS bank_in_base_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.BANK_IN_SVC_AMT), 0) AS bank_in_svc_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.BANK_IN_CRD_AMT), 0) AS bank_in_crd_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.EXC_AMT), 0) AS exc_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.SUB_BASE_AMT), 0) AS sub_base_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.SUB_SVC_AMT), 0) AS sub_svc_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.SUB_CRD_AMT), 0) AS sub_crd_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.SUB_AMT), 0) AS sub_amt , IFNULL(SUM(AF.BIZ_CRD_AMT), 0) AS biz_crd_amt , IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_SVC_FEE)), 0) AS agent_svc_fee , IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_CRD_FEE)), 0) AS agent_crd_fee , IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_LOAN_FEE)), 0) AS agent_loan_fee , IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_SVC_FEE)), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_CRD_FEE)), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(AF.AGENCY_LOAN_FEE)), 0) AS agent_tot_fee FROM VW_AGENCY_FEE_LIST AF JOIN TB_AGENCY AG ON AG.AGENCY_CD = AF.AGENCY_CD JOIN TB_CHAIN TC ON TC.CHAIN_NO = AF.CHAIN_NO JOIN TB_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TC.CEO_ID WHERE AF.ADJUST_DATE BETWEEN CONCAT(#{sch_month}, '-01') AND CONCAT(#{sch_month}, '-31')
